command_line: { grep -v "^[ \t]*$" /galaxy/server/database/objects/7/4/9/dataset_74900462-eefa-4d22-a05f-0640607060ef.dat > accessions || { echo "No accession numbers in input. Aborting." 1>&2; exit 1; } } && mkdir outdir && cd outdir && ignore_errors=0 && while read accession; do echo "Downloading accession number: " $accession " ..." >> ../error.log && ncbi-acc-download --molecule 'nucleotide' --format 'genbank' --extended-validation all ${accession}; failure=$?; if [ $failure -ne 0 ]; then echo " failed." >> ../error.log; if [ $ignore_errors -ne 0 ]; then echo $accession >> ../failed.txt; else exit 1; fi; else echo " done." >> ../error.log; fi; sleep 2; done < ../accessions 2> >(tee -a ../error.log >&2);
